name: Grin Grove
description:
Grin Grove is a short precision platformer about making the sad glad. Right now it includes ugly pixel art, bad music,  tons of bugs, and only half of the planned content!

Many thanks to Shaun Spalding for their amazing platformer tutorial, without which this game definitely wouldn't have been made. Also many thanks to Juju Adams for creating the infinitely useful tools Input, and Scribble.
